data.text:
ITFA CYPRUS, LAUNCH OF CONFERENCE APP AND OTHER IMPORTANT INFO

The ITFA Board wishes to bring a few points to your attention, relating to the upcoming ITFA 50th Annual Conference:

1. Launch of ITFA Conference APP (CrowdComms) & Networking Portal

2. Few rooms available at the St Raphael Resort & Marina, Cyprus

3. Dedicated registration desk for VIP sponsors (Silver, Premium Silver, Gold, Global, Titanium, Platinum and Diamond sponsors)

50th ITFA Annual Conference, Cyprus – Rooms at the second hotel are selling out fast! REGISTER NOW

ITFA’s 50th Annual Conference is only two months away. To register click here at the earliest. Bear in mind that the second hotel – St. Raphael Resort and Marina – is also filling up quickly, with only a few rooms left, so we urge you to register now in order to guarantee hotel accommodation. If anyone is still awaiting approval, then send us an email ASAP.

REMINDER: 50th ITFA Annual Conference, Cyprus – 4/6 September 2024 – ESG Sponsorship Initiative

For the very first time, ITFA will be collaborating with the World Sustainability Foundation (WSF) with whom we have identified some interesting projects which our trade finance community can contribute to. Please click here to view the ESG Brochure or send us an email on info@itfa.org for more information.

ITFA offers conciliation and arbitration services in cases of dispute where at least one member of the Association is involved. This service is of particular value in those cases where trade finance disputes arise. Whatever the case we invite you to get in touch.

Get In Touch
